hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
echo Promoted Job: %PROMOTED_JOB_NAME% echo Promoted Build Number: %PROMOTED_NUMBER% echo P4 Changelist: %P4_CHANGESET%
IF EXIST \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%_packaging.txt ( echo Packaging in progress, wait for 5 minutes before proceeding with the build promotion sleep 300 ) ELSE ( echo No packaging is in progress, promoting build ) echo "Promoting build for %P4_CHANGESET%" > \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%_promoting.txt rd /s /q \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%\build-packaging xcopy \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%\build-%P4_CHANGESET% \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%\build-packaging /e /d /i echo "changelist %P4_CHANGESET%, build number %PROMOTED_NUMBER%" > \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%\build-packaging\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%_%P4_CHANGESET%.txt del /f /q \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\Builds\jenkins\%PROMOTED_JOB_NAME%_promoting.txt
